A: We offer standard shipping (3-5 business days), expedited shipping (1-2 business days), and free shipping for orders over $100. Shipping costs are calculated at checkout based on your location and the weight of your order.

Q: How do I track my order?
A: Once your order is shipped, you will receive a tracking number via email and SMS. You can use this number to track your package on the carrier's website or through our order tracking portal.

Q: What is your return policy?
A: We accept returns within 30 days of purchase for a full refund or exchange, provided the items are in their original condition, with tags attached, and original packaging. Certain items, such as personalized goods and undergarments, are non-returnable. Please see our detailed return policy page on our website.

Q: How can I contact customer support?
A: You can contact our customer support team by phone at 555-123-4567, by email at support@example.com, or through our live chat feature on our website. We also have a support ticket system for more complex inquiries.

Q: Do you offer discounts?
A: We occasionally offer promotional discounts. Please sign up for our newsletter, follow us on social media, and check our website regularly to stay informed about upcoming deals and special offers.

Q: What payment methods do you accept?
A: We accept major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), PayPal, and Apple Pay.

Q: How do I create an account?
A: You can create an account by clicking on the 'Sign Up' link at the top of our website and filling out the required information. Creating an account allows for easier order tracking, managing your preferences, and accessing exclusive discounts.

Q: Do you ship internationally?
A: Yes, we ship to select international countries. Please check our shipping information page for the list of eligible countries and associated costs. Note that international shipping may have longer delivery times and possible additional custom fees.

Q: How do I cancel an order?
A: You can cancel an order within 2 hours of placing it. To cancel, go to your order page on our website. After the 2 hour window, your order may have been processed and cannot be canceled, but you can still return it according to our return policy.
